description: For more than 30 years, Mr Richard Quek had one of the most feared but least understood jobs in Singapore - a driving tester.  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The Lives They Live: Tales of a veteran driving tester
title_page: The Lives They Live: Tales of a veteran driving tester | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - A heavily tattooed man trembled at the sight of Mr Richard Quek, and so did a surgeon with steady hands.
Some begged him to give them another chance. Others cried.
